short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: generate website specific password from your main password

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pure Password Manager is a new kind of password manager. You don't need to sign up to our service as we do not store any of your password. Indeed, you main password is the only thing you have to remember as we only offer a way to convert it to website-specific password in a deterministic way.
